content.question: In Latin America, data for employment in many large urban areas are most likely to be incomplete because

choices.label: records are kept mainly for male workers
many people work in the informal sector

content.answer: many people work in the informal sector

unit.text: 7: Industrial and Economic Development Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain spatial relationships in a specified context or region of the world, using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
